title: Address an OSHA Complaint
description: The company receives a formal complaint from OSHA regarding inadequate fall protection on a specific site. The safety director must respond.

tasks.description: Immediately conduct an unannounced safety audit of the specified project site, focusing on fall protection.
Document any findings from the audit and implement immediate corrective actions.
tasks.expected_outcome: The audit findings are logged and corrective actions are assigned.

tasks.description: Draft a formal response to OSHA, detailing the audit results and the corrective actions taken.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal response letter is drafted.
